title: Pico De Gallo

ingredients.content: 2 ½ oz white onion (approx. ¼ onion)
½ oz cilantro, leaves only (approx. ½ bunch)
17 ½ oz Roma tomatoes, seeds removed and diced (approx. ¼ in.)

preparations.content: Place garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add onion, cilantro and jalapeño and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lime juice and mix <b>3 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add tomatoes, pepper and salt and stir <b>5 sec/speed 2<b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Wash fruits and vegetables before using.
If tomatoes are really juicy, strain first using simmering basket before adding to recipe.
